body.name: HP 14" HD Laptop Ultral Light for Students and Business, Intel N4120 Processor, 16GB RAM, 128GB Storage (64GB eMMC+64GB Ghost Manta SD Card), WiFi, Bluetooth, HDMI, Webcam
body.stockDetail: Only 20 left in stock - order soon.
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 5 hrs 36 mins
features: 【14'' HD Display】14-inch diagonal HD (1366 x 768) micro-edge, BrightView. With virtually no bezel encircling the display, an ultra-wide viewing experience provides for seamless multi-monitor set-ups.

【RAM & Storage】Upgraded to 16GB high-bandwidth DDR4 Memory (2400 MHz), Adequate high-bandwidth RAM to smoothly run multiple applications and browser tabs all at once. 128GB Storage (64GB eMMC+64GB Ghost Manta SD Card)

【Processor】Intel Celeron N4120, 2 Cores & 2 Threads, 1.10 GHz Base Frequency, Up to 2.80 GHz Burst Frequency, 2 MB Cahce, Intel UHD Graphics 600, Handle multitasking reliably with the perfect combination of performance, power consumption, and value.
【Ports】1 x SuperSpeed USB Type-C 5Gbps signaling rate; 2 x SuperSpeed USB Type-A 5Gbps signaling rate; 1 x HDMI 1.4; 1 x RJ-45; 1 x AC smart pin; 1 x headphone/microphone combo.

【Activate 1 Year MS office 365 & Win 11 in S mode】(About switch to regular Win11, see the detail in Product description) Activate pre-installed Office: 1.Launch any Office app > 2.Start your activation by signing in with your Microsoft account(Create a account if you don't have one ) > 3.Click ''Activative Office'' > 4.Sign in your account and follow the next prompts. > 5. Complete Step 1,2 and 3 > 6.Click on Refresh once Office is ready > 7.Open a document and accept the license agreement.
body.description: How to switch s mode to windows 11 1. On your PC running Windows 11 in S mode, open Settings > Update & Security > Activation. 2. In the Switch to Windows 11 Home or Switch to Windows 11 Pro section, select Go to the Store. (If you also see an "Upgrade your edition of Windows" section, be careful not to click the "Go to the Store" link that appears there) 3. On the Switch out of S mode (or similar) page that appears in the Microsoft Store, select the Get button. After you see a confirmation message on the page, you'll be able to install apps from outside of the Microsoft Store Display: 14" diagonal, HD (1366 x 768), micro-edge, Anti-glare Processor: Intel Celeron N4120 (up to 2.8 GHz burst frequency, 2 cores, 2 threads) Memory: Upgraded to 16GB DDR4 RAM Storage: 128GB Storage (64GB eMMC+64GB Ghost Manta SD Card) Graphics: Intel UHD Graphics 600 Wireless Connectivity: Realtek RTL8821CE 802.11a/b/g/n/ac (1x1) Wi-Fi and Bluetooth 4.2 combo Webcam: HP True Vision 720p HD camera with integrated digital microphone External Ports: 1 x SuperSpeed USB Type-C 5Gbps signaling rate 2 x SuperSpeed USB Type-A 5Gbps signaling rate 1 x HDMI 1.4 1 x RJ-45 1 x AC smart pin 1 x Headphone/microphone combo Minimum Dimensions (W x D x H): 12.8" x 8.89" x 0.783" Weight: 3.24 lbs

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great if you dont wanna spend over 300
reviews.reviewText: The 16 gb ram is a great deal.One thing that was weird was the speakers making a noisy static sound when I was watching a movie. But I went into volume settings & turned it to mono audio (combine left n right audio) and it stopped. Ive only had it a day so I will come back and update if anything else happens but it hasnt done the static sound since. Could just be because its brand new, I didnt have volume up super high or anything. Gonna go ahead and buy a speaker to plug into it just in case, I cant complain because of the price. A $20 speaker is an easy trade off to have a high quality laptop with a low budget.I havent had a laptop for years, Ive missed it and I think I made a great choice. I was surprised at how lightweight it is, and it doesnt get super hot even after streaming live video almost all day. I watch twitch a LOT and this lil guy is doing a great job. I love the metallic light pink color too.Wanted to write a review since there arent any I can see for this yet, I was kinda worried about buying something with no reviews but it has turned out just fine so far (besides the weird static thing, but like I said it hasnt happened again yet). I'm writing this review from it right now!! Lol. Worth every penny. The ethernet connector also works great its the main way Im getting internet to it for now

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value, love the simplistic design
reviews.reviewText: Very simple and functional yet it has all of the essentials without any of the gimmicky frills. Maybe it takes a $300 laptop so I don't have to deal with built in Alexa-enabled something, HP-specific ports, fingerprint scanner, and other stuff I don't want or need. They don't try anything fancy with this one which for me is a positive. Plus it's TKL keyboard which really should be the new norm. Does not have a backlit keyboard which is a slight miss but for the price it's not a huge deal.You can take it out of S-mode easily and remove a lot of the addons and you have yourself a perfectly functional Windows machine. Despite the lower-tier hardware it still starts up very quickly if you make sure you don't have too much bloatware. Sure it's a little slow at times but if you're using it for day to day tasks it should be fine. Battery life seems very good, the laptop is also fairly lightweight as well. What more could you ask for at this price point.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars My daughter likes it
reviews.reviewText: It worked out of the box, seems good quality, and does what my daughter needs. Seems slow to me, but she’s happy so I’m good

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stand behind your product
reviews.reviewText: The first one of these I got on Monday and suddenly on Tuesday at locked up and you couldn’t even open it or log on or do anything it was like totally dead so I did my Amazon thing and returned it. I got a replacement one by Friday I call that pretty darn good especially since it’s Christmas, I love the HP laptop and I got an HP mouse and I haven’t learned to do everything yet but I’m practicing now and getting it the way I want it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really Nice! Follow the Directions!
reviews.reviewText: Computer is truly excellent for the cost! So happy with it from ease of setup to functionality. My only caveat is you MUST capture and follow the instructions --available twice in the product listing-- for disabling "S Mode" if you want to download anything that's not a Microsoft product. You will be bullied to use Microsoft Edge. Ignore that. Overall, super happy with this purchase!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is fine for the price, but I would not purchase if you are doing time sensitive tasks all the time. It takes a while to load pages sometimes. The laptop is super lightweight it is a little flimsy though I can see the keys moving into it when typing on it. Have had it for over a month will update later.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Nice laptop for work. Seems to work great for what I’m doing browsing, zoom calls. Nice and light too
